additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Built-in furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Satellite, Cable-TV, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 we can offer you the 3 rooms flat in Saburtalo area (Pekini street) next to the 'nikala cafe'. 1 minute walk to underground station (Bukia garden) the flat is really comfortable, fully fitted kitchen, bedrooms and living room,with heating system, hot water and fully cold-protected windows. satellite antenna, perfect location, all of these you can have for 800$ P/M. flat is 100 squ/m.. if any other questions, you can call to Maia - the cell-phone 599854998. (that's no agency, it's private)
